thread.title: Beacon Health Options Names Dan Sheehan as Chief Information Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Beacon Health Options Names Dan Sheehan as Chief Information Officer
text:
BOSTON, March 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Beacon Health Options (Beacon) announced today that Dan Sheehan has joined the national behavioral health management leader as Executive Vice President and Chief Information Officer (CIO), effective immediately. In this role, Mr. Sheehan is responsible for leading the company's information technology vision, strategy and execution. Based in Boston, he reports to Russell C. Petrella, Ph.D., Beacon's President and Chief Executive Officer.
"Dan brings a dynamic combination of strong management skills and a successful track record of driving technology innovation and service excellence that will benefit our company for years to come," said Dr. Petrella. "He is the ideal person to lead the critical work we are doing to ensure we continually meet the evolving needs of our members, providers, and clients."
Mr. Sheehan joins Beacon from DentaQuest, the second largest dental health insurer in the nation, where he was CIO. At DentaQuest, he spearheaded major system integration efforts and led all IT functions. Previously, he was with Actuate Partners, serving as a leader in operations and technology due diligences.
Earlier in this career, Mr. Sheehan was Chief Operating Officer at Modell's Sporting Goods, where he managed operations and technology. He also served as CIO at Dunkin' Brands and was responsible for the brand's global retail technology strategy, support and execution. At Dunkin' Brands, Mr. Sheehan led the IT department's cross-functional involvement to prepare for the company's successful initial public offering.
Mr. Sheehan earned his bachelor's degree in Computer Information Systems from Suffolk University and a master's in Business Administration from Salem State College. He is a board member of the YMCA of Greater Boston and of Ninkasi Technology LLC.
About Beacon Health Options
Beacon Health Options is a managed behavioral health care company that serves 44 million individuals across all 50 states. On behalf of employers, health plans and government agencies, we manage behavioral health insurance and EAP benefits to ensure that individuals have access to robust mental health and addiction services. To promote quality care, Beacon works with its provider partners to design innovative programs and solutions that directly address the challenges our behavioral health care system faces today. Beacon is a national leader in the fields of mental and emotional well-being, addiction, recovery and resilience, employee assistance, and wellness. Collaborating with a network of providers nationwide, we help individuals live their lives to the fullest potential. For more information, visit www.beaconhealthoptions.com and connect with us on www.facebook.com/beaconhealthoptions , www.twitter.com/beaconhealthopt and www.linkedin.com/company/beacon-health-options .
